text: Are there any ways to initiate a conversation or thread without first receiving an incoming message? In our case, this applies to SMS conversations.

Great question!
This is not possible today.

And this is generally true of our HubSpot-built messaging integrations at this time as well (incl HubSpot SMS).

We're positioning this API as the best fit for reactive customer support right now (e.g. customer starts the convo). Certainly want to expand to outgoing communication, but that's going to take some planning around contact identification/availability across first- and third-party channels, and probably having to model something around subscription/consent as well.
